snippet: Improving its ability to find treasure amid junk offers Facebook a chance to topple Google from the throne as the king of search.
abstract: Analysts say Facebook, which has had stock rally over increased advertising efforts, needs to improve its search ability to challenge Google; it has expanded its search engineer staff and rolled out new features to help users discover information on site.
lead_paragraph: Improving its ability to find treasure amid junk offers Facebook a chance to topple Google from the throne as the king of search.

headline.seo: Fortunes of Facebook May Hinge on Searches
headline.main: Fortunes of Facebook May Hinge on Searches
headline.print_headline: Fortunes Of Facebook May Hinge On Searches
